contextId.information: "I did not baptize anyone else because I was afraid that they might later boast that I had baptized them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: This was so that no one would say that you were baptized into my name

contextId.information: This can be stated as a positive. AT: "The temptations that affect you are temptations that all people experience" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to all humanity

contextId.information: This can be stated positively. AT: "the woman depends on the man, and the man depends on the woman" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: the woman is not independent from the man, nor is the man independent from the woman

contextId.information: "It rejoices only in righteousness and truth" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: It does not rejoice in unrighteousness. Instead, it rejoices in the truth

contextId.information: This can be expressed positively and combined with the other positive statement. AT: "only for believers" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: not for unbelievers, but for believers
